purpose: Curate a comprehensive list of academic and industrial resources related to Large Language Models (LLM) and AIOps.
principle: Aggregates and categorizes research papers, articles, and resources related to LLMs and AI for IT Operations.
reusability: Serves as a reference repository for researchers and practitioners interested in LLMs and AIOps, providing links to various external resources.
limitations: Primarily a curated list, does not provide original content or tools; relies on external resources for detailed information.
name: awesome-LLM-AIOps
description: A list of awesome academic researches and industrial materials about Large Language Model (LLM) and Artificial Intelligence for IT Operations (AIOps).
